channel.title: Create Random List
channel.description: When it comes to the armors and weapons I want to randomize for variety. However, I don't want to see or wear all the items in my collections. I also feel deterred from getting everything because of this. Would it be possible to implement a feature that allows me to select a list of weapons and armor I want to randomize?
